bg_BG {
    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%f%N%a%N%d%N%b%N%sN%h, %e, %r%N%z %T%N%c%N" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: AmPmMarkers */
    CountryISBNNumber { "100" }
    CountryNumber { "100" }
    CurrencyElements { 
            "\u043B\u0432",
            "BGL ",
            ",",
    }
    DateTimePatterns { 
            "%l,mm,ss",
            "%k,mm,ss",
            "%k,mm,ss",
            "%k,mm,ss",
            "dd.MMMM.yyyy",
            "M/d/yy (EEE) h:mm a z",
            "dd.MMMM.yyyy",
            "dd.MMMM.yyyy",
            "{1} {0}",
    }
    DayAbbreviations { 
            "\u043D\u0434",
            "\u043F\u043D",
            "\u0432\u0442",
            "\u0441\u0440",
            "\u0447\u0442",
            "\u043F\u0442",
            "\u0441\u0431",
    }
    DayNames { 
            "\u043D\u0435\u0434\u0435\u043B\u044F",
            "\u043F\u043E\u043D\u0435\u0434\u0435\u043B\u043D\u0438\u043A",
            "\u0432\u0442\u043E\u0440\u043D\u0438\u043A",
            "\u0441\u0440\u044F\u0434\u0430",
            "\u0447\u0435\u0442\u0432\u044A\u0440\u0442\u044A\u043A",
            "\u043F\u0435\u0442\u044A\u043A",
            "\u0441\u044A\u0431\u043E\u0442\u0430",
    }
    Identification { 
        Title { "Bulgarian locale for Bulgaria" }
        Source { "Linux Society Bulgaria" }
        Address { "develop@linux.zonebg.com" }
        Contact { "Delyan Toshev" }
        Email { "delyant@yahoo.com" }
        Telephone { "" }
        Fax { "" }
        Language { "bg" }
        Territory { "BG" }
        Audience { "" }
        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }
        Revision { "2.0" }
        Date { "2001-11-16" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: LanguageLibraryUse */
    Measurement { "Metric" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "^[+1\u0414\u0434DdYyOo].*" }
        NoExpression { "^[-0\u041D\u043DNnKk].*" }
        YesStr { "" }
        NoStr { "" }
    }
    MonthAbbreviations { 
            "\u044F\u043D\u0443",
            "\u0444\u0435\u0432",
            "\u043C\u0430\u0440",
            "\u0430\u043F\u0440",
            "\u043C\u0430\u0439",
            "\u044E\u043D\u0438",
            "\u044E\u043B\u0438",
            "\u0430\u0432\u0433",
            "\u0441\u0435\u043F",
            "\u043E\u043A\u0442",
            "\u043D\u043E\u0435",
            "\u0434\u0435\u043A",
            "",
    }
    MonthNames { 
            "\u044F\u043D\u0443\u0430\u0440\u0438",
            "\u0444\u0435\u0432\u0440\u0443\u0430\u0440\u0438",
            "\u043C\u0430\u0440\u0442",
            "\u0430\u043F\u0440\u0438\u043B",
            "\u043C\u0430\u0439",
            "\u044E\u043D\u0438",
            "\u044E\u043B\u0438",
            "\u0430\u0432\u0433\u0443\u0441\u0442",
            "\u0441\u0435\u043F\u0442\u0435\u043C\u0432\u0440\u0438",
            "\u043E\u043A\u0442\u043E\u043C\u0432\u0440\u0438",
            "\u043D\u043E\u0435\u043C\u0432\u0440\u0438",
            "\u0434\u0435\u043A\u0435\u043C\u0432\u0440\u0438",
            "",
    }
    NameFormat { 
        NamePattern { "%s%t%g%t%m%t%f" }
        GeneralSalutaion { "" }
        ShortSalutationMr { "\u0433-\u0434\u0438\u043D" }
        ShortSalutationMiss { "\u0433-\u0436\u0438\u0446\u0430" }
        ShortSalutationMrs { "\u0433-\u0436\u0430" }
        LongSalutationMr { "" }
        LongSalutationMiss { "\u0433-\u0436\u0430" }
        LongSalutationMrs { "" }
    }
    NumberElements { 
            ",",
            "",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",
            "\uFFFD",
    }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
            "#,##0.00 \u00A4;-#,##0.00 \u00A4",
            "#,##0%",
    }
    PaperSize { 
        Hieght { "297" }
        Width { "210" }
        Units { "mm" }
    }
    TelephoneFormat { 
        InternationalFormat { "(+%c %a) %l" }
        DomesticFormat { "" }
        InternationalDialCode { "00" }
        InternationalPrefix { "359" }
    }
}
